name: Community Jobs Program (JCP)
description: CJP is a transitional subsidized employment Program for CalWorks recipients. The program provides 6 months of subsidized job placements with non-profit agencies. Participants gain work experience and/or increase their current skills with the goal of long-term unsubsidized job placement. This program is referral-based and clients are referred by the Human Service Agency.
